content: Register for MyLankaTel self-service: 1) Download MyLankaTel app (Play Store/App Store) or visit my.lankatel.lk. 2) Click 'Register'. 3) Enter LankaTel mobile number. 4) Receive OTP via SMS. 5) Set password (8+ characters, include letter and number). 6) Set security question. 7) Account active immediately. Benefits: View bills, pay online, manage packages, track usage.

Reset MyLankaTel password: 1) Open app or website. 2) Click 'Forgot Password'. 3) Enter registered mobile number. 4) OTP sent via SMS (valid 5 minutes). 5) Enter OTP. 6) Create new password. 7) Login with new password. If OTP not received: Check SMS filters, ensure correct number, try again after 2 minutes. Alternative: Call 1234 for manual reset with security verification.

MyLankaTel username is your registered mobile number. If you have multiple numbers: 1) Open app > Login > 'Which number?' 2) Enter any LankaTel number linked to your NIC. 3) OTP verification. 4) View all linked numbers. 5) Select number to manage. For business accounts with custom usernames: Contact 1234 or email support@lankatel.lk with NIC for recovery.

Update your contact details: Email - MyLankaTel app > Profile > Update Email > Verify with OTP. Alternate Phone - App > Profile > Alternate Number > Verify. Address - Visit service center with NIC and proof of new address (cannot be done online for security). Name Change - Service center with legal name change documents (gazette, marriage certificate).

Upgrade to higher plan: Prepaid - Activate higher package anytime via *#123# or app (immediate effect). Postpaid - Request via 1234, app, or service center. Changes take effect: Immediately for data-only upgrades, Next billing cycle for plan changes. Pro-rated charges for mid-cycle upgrades. No commitment period for standard upgrades.

Downgrade to lower plan: 1) Postpaid requires 30-day notice. 2) Call 1234 or visit service center. 3) Current plan continues until next billing cycle. 4) Early downgrade fee may apply if in contract period. 5) Ensure you understand new plan limits before downgrading. 6) Data rollover not available after downgrade. Prepaid: Simply activate lower package when current expires.

Temporarily suspend service: 1) Call 1234 or visit service center. 2) Minimum suspension: 1 month, Maximum: 6 months. 3) Monthly suspension fee: LKR 200 (keeps number reserved). 4) No usage charges during suspension. 5) Reactivation: Call 1234 or visit service center. 6) Same number and plan restored. 7) Auto-reactivation on suspension end date. Good for: Extended travel, temporary relocation.

Reactivate suspended/barred service: 1) For voluntary suspension: Call 1234, immediate reactivation. 2) For non-payment suspension: Clear outstanding + late fee (LKR 150) + reconnection fee (LKR 500). 3) Payment via app, bank, or service center. 4) Service restored within 2 hours of payment confirmation. 5) If suspended >90 days, number may be lost - contact immediately.

Relocate fixed connection to new address: 1) Check coverage at new address first. 2) Call 1234 or visit service center. 3) Provide new address and preferred installation date. 4) Relocation fee: LKR 2,000 (Colombo), LKR 3,500 (outstation). 5) Timeline: 5-7 business days. 6) Existing plan and number retained. 7) Equipment may change based on new location technology. 8) Cannot relocate between districts.

Transfer connection to another person: 1) Both parties visit service center with original NICs. 2) Current owner signs transfer authorization form. 3) New owner completes registration form. 4) Clear all outstanding dues (mandatory). 5) Transfer fee: LKR 500. 6) Processing: 24-48 hours. 7) New owner assumes contract obligations. 8) Postpaid: New owner must pass credit check. 9) Number and plan transferred.

Add additional line to postpaid account: 1) Primary account holder requests via 1234 or service center. 2) Maximum 5 supplementary lines per account. 3) Each line: Monthly fee + shared or separate data allocation. 4) Billing combined to primary account. 5) Primary holder responsible for all charges. 6) Supplementary users cannot make account changes. Good for: Family plans, business lines.

Cancel LankaTel service: 1) Call 1234 or visit service center with NIC. 2) Postpaid: 30-day notice required. 3) Clear all outstanding balances. 4) Return rented equipment (ONT, router if not purchased). 5) Security deposit refund within 14 days. 6) Final bill generated and sent. 7) Number released and cannot be recovered. 8) Contract termination fee if cancelling before commitment period.

Early termination of contract: If cancelling before contract end date: 1) Device installment balance becomes due immediately. 2) Early termination fee: Remaining months x monthly commitment fee. 3) Example: 12-month contract, cancel at month 6 = 6 x LKR 500 = LKR 3,000 ETF. 4) Promotional discounts reversed. 5) Request contract details to understand obligations before cancelling.

Set up account PIN for added security: 1) Call 1234 and request PIN setup. 2) Choose 4-digit PIN. 3) PIN required for: Plan changes, Number porting, SIM replacement, Account closure. 4) Reset PIN: Visit service center with NIC only. 5) Three wrong attempts locks account (call 1234 to unlock). Keep PIN confidential - LankaTel will never ask for full PIN.

Manage multiple LankaTel numbers: 1) MyLankaTel app supports multiple numbers. 2) Add number: Profile > Add Account > Enter number > OTP verify. 3) Switch between numbers in app. 4) View combined or individual usage. 5) Unlink: Profile > Manage Accounts > Remove. 6) Family view: See all family members' usage (requires their consent). 7) Single login manages all accounts.

Manage auto-renewal for packages: 1) MyLankaTel app > Active Packages > Select package. 2) Toggle Auto-Renew ON/OFF. 3) When ON: Package renews automatically when balance available/bill generated. 4) When OFF: Package expires, reverts to base rates. 5) SMS notification before auto-renewal. 6) Cancel auto-renewal anytime. 7) Some promotional packages do not support auto-renewal.

Manage notifications: MyLankaTel app > Settings > Notifications. Options: Usage alerts (80%, 90%, 100% of package), Bill ready notification, Payment confirmation, Promotional offers, Service updates. Channels: SMS, Push notification, Email. Set quiet hours: No notifications between specified times. Mandatory notifications (billing, service) cannot be disabled.

For deceased account holder: 1) Legal heir visits service center with: Death certificate (original), NIC of deceased, Legal heir NIC, Letter of administration/probate (if applicable). 2) Options: Transfer to heir, Cancel service. 3) Outstanding dues settled from estate. 4) Deposit refund to legal heir. 5) Processing: 7-14 days. 6) Contact 1234 for guidance on required documents.

Corporate account management: 1) Dedicated account manager assigned. 2) Admin portal for bulk user management. 3) Cost center allocation for departments. 4) Usage reports by employee/department. 5) Bulk plan changes and activations. 6) Consolidated monthly invoice. 7) Custom billing cycles available. 8) Contact: 1237 or enterprise@lankatel.lk.

Convert prepaid to postpaid: 1) Call 1234 or visit service center. 2) Requirements: Proof of income, proof of address. 3) Credit evaluation. 4) Same number retained. 5) Remaining prepaid balance: Forfeited or credited to first bill. 6) Processing: 24-48 hours. 7) Postpaid benefits: No recharge needed, higher credit limit, device installment eligibility. 8) Security deposit may apply.

Convert postpaid to prepaid: 1) Call 1234 or visit service center. 2) Clear all outstanding dues. 3) Complete final billing cycle. 4) Same number retained. 5) Processing: 24-48 hours. 6) Initial recharge required (min LKR 100). 7) Previous contract obligations: Must be fulfilled or early termination fee applies. 8) Device installments: Must be cleared or continue paying separately.

Enable two-factor authentication (2FA) for enhanced account security: 1) MyLankaTel app > Settings > Security > Enable 2FA. 2) Choose method: SMS OTP (sent to registered number) or Authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy). 3) For SMS: OTP sent for each login from new device. 4) For Authenticator: Scan QR code in app, enter 6-digit code to verify. 5) Save backup codes securely (used if phone lost). 6) 2FA required for: Login from new device, high-value transactions over LKR 5,000, account settings changes, SIM replacement requests. 7) Disable 2FA: Security settings with current authentication. Highly recommended for postpaid and corporate accounts. Contact 1234 for setup assistance if needed.

Download detailed account statements and bills: 1) MyLankaTel app > Billing > View Statements or my.lankatel.lk > Billing History. 2) Select date range (up to 24 months history available). 3) Format options: PDF (for printing/records) or Excel (for analysis). 4) Itemized details include: Call logs with numbers and duration, data usage by session, SMS count, package activations with timestamps, payment transactions, adjustments and credits. 5) Email statement directly to registered email from app. 6) For records older than 24 months: Visit service center with NIC or email billing@lankatel.lk with request. Processing takes 3-5 business days. Statements useful for expense claims, tax purposes, business accounting, and personal usage analysis. All downloads are free of charge. Keep statements for at least 12 months for dispute resolution.

Request credit limit increase for postpaid accounts: 1) Eligibility: Account active for minimum 6 months with good payment history (no defaults in past 6 months). 2) Call 1236 billing hotline or visit service center in Colombo, Kandy, Galle. 3) Provide proof of income: Recent salary slip, bank statement (3 months), business income proof. 4) Credit evaluation conducted (takes 3-5 business days). 5) Current limit tiers: Standard LKR 5,000, Silver LKR 10,000, Gold LKR 25,000, Platinum LKR 50,000. 6) Limit increase: Up to 50% of current limit based on credit assessment. 7) Temporary limit increase available for emergencies (valid 1 month only). Higher credit limits enable purchasing larger data packages, device financing, and uninterrupted service during peak usage months. Approved increases take effect within 24 hours.

Create shared data pool for family or small business: 1) Available for postpaid accounts only. 2) Primary account holder calls 1234 or uses MyLankaTel app > Family Plans > Create Pool. 3) Add members: Enter their LankaTel mobile numbers and send invitations. 4) Members accept invitation via SMS link. 5) Choose pool size: 50GB (LKR 3,000/month), 100GB (LKR 5,000/month), 200GB (LKR 8,500/month), 500GB (LKR 18,000/month). 6) Data shared among all members in real-time. 7) Primary holder receives usage alerts at 75% and 90%. 8) Individual member usage visible in app dashboard. 9) Members can opt out anytime without penalty. 10) Benefits: 30-40% cost savings vs individual plans, simplified billing to one account, no individual package management needed. Maximum 10 members per pool. Popular for families in Colombo suburbs, Kandy, and small businesses in Galle.

Activate international roaming before traveling abroad: 1) Call 1234 at least 24 hours before departure date. 2) Provide travel dates and destination countries. 3) Requirements: Account active minimum 90 days, no outstanding dues, security deposit (LKR 5,000-25,000 based on destination and usage). 4) Roaming activated within 2-4 hours of request. 5) Check country-specific rates: my.lankatel.lk > Roaming Rates or app. 6) Roaming data/call packs available: Regional (SAARC countries), Asia pack, Europe pack, Worldwide pack with bundled data and calling minutes. 7) Usage alerts sent via SMS when reaching 50%, 80%, 100% of deposit. 8) Deactivation: Automatic upon return or call 1234. 9) Popular destinations covered: India, Maldives, UAE, Singapore, UK, USA, Australia, Thailand. Prepaid customers must maintain minimum balance of LKR 1,000. Postpaid charges added to next bill. Test roaming immediately upon arrival by calling +94712341234 (LankaTel test number - free).

Enroll your smartphone in LankaTel device insurance program: 1) Available for devices purchased through LankaTel or BYOD (Bring Your Own Device). 2) Coverage includes: Screen damage, liquid damage, theft, accidental damage, hardware malfunction. 3) Premium tiers: LKR 350/month (devices up to Rs. 50,000 value), LKR 650/month (Rs. 50,000-100,000), LKR 950/month (Rs. 100,000-200,000). 4) Enrollment must be within 30 days of device purchase or activation. 5) Submit IMEI number, purchase invoice copy, device photos (all sides). 6) Processing time: 48 hours for approval. 7) Claims: Maximum 2 per year, excess payment LKR 2,500 per claim. 8) Claim process: Report incident within 48 hours via 1234, submit police report (for theft cases), device assessment at authorized centers in Colombo Fort, Kandy City Center, Galle. 9) Repair or replacement within 7-10 business days. Popular for iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, and premium Android devices. Cancel anytime with 30-day notice. Insurance premium added to monthly bill (postpaid) or deducted from balance (prepaid).

Set up automatic bill payment to avoid late fees and service interruption: 1) MyLankaTel app > Billing > Auto-Pay Settings or my.lankatel.lk. 2) Choose payment method: Credit/debit card (Visa, Mastercard), bank account direct debit, mobile wallet (Dialog, Mobitel). 3) Enter payment details and authorize standing instruction. 4) Set payment date preference: On due date, 3 days before due date, or custom date. 5) Confirmation email sent after each auto-payment. 6) SMS alert sent 2 days before auto-debit. 7) Ensure sufficient funds to avoid failed payment (LKR 500 failed payment fee applies). 8) Modify or cancel auto-pay anytime through app settings. 9) Supported banks: Bank of Ceylon (BOC), People's Bank, Commercial Bank, Sampath Bank, HNB, NDB, Seylan. Benefits: Never miss payment deadlines, avoid LKR 300 late fee, maintain uninterrupted service, improve credit rating. Complete payment history visible in app. System attempts auto-pay 3 times over 7 days before service suspension.

Dispute incorrect billing charges through proper process: 1) Review bill carefully within 7 days of receipt. 2) Call 1236 billing hotline or visit service center with bill copy and supporting documents (SMS confirmations, package activation receipts). 3) Common dispute types: Unauthorized charges, incorrect package billing, roaming overcharges, duplicate charges, data usage discrepancies. 4) Dispute logged with unique reference number provided to you. 5) Investigation period: 5-10 business days depending on complexity. 6) During investigation: Pay undisputed portion of bill to avoid service interruption, disputed amount kept on hold. 7) Resolution outcomes: If billing error confirmed - credit issued to account, adjustment appears on next bill statement. If charges are valid - detailed explanation provided with usage logs, full payment becomes due. 8) Escalation path: Not satisfied with resolution? Request supervisor review or email complaints@lankatel.lk with reference number. 9) Final escalation: Contact Telecommunications Regulatory Commission (TRC) at trc.gov.lk. Keep all documentation: SMS notifications, usage logs from app, package activation confirmations. Resolution rate: 85% of disputes resolved favorably within 10 days.

content: Port your existing mobile number from another operator to LankaTel (MNP - Mobile Number Portability): 1) From your current number, SMS 'PORT<space>Mobile Number' to 1234. Example: PORT 0771234567 to 1234. 2) Receive UPC (Unique Porting Code) valid for 15 days via SMS. 3) Visit any LankaTel service center in Colombo, Kandy, Galle, Jaffna, Kurunegala, Matara, or Negombo with original NIC and UPC code. 4) Choose desired LankaTel plan (prepaid or postpaid). 5) Pay one-time porting fee: LKR 500. 6) Porting timeline: 3-5 business days for completion. 7) During porting period: Old service continues working until porting completes. 8) Porting completion: SMS notification sent, insert new LankaTel SIM card. 9) Keep old SIM for 7 days (may be needed for reverification). Eligibility requirements: Number must be active minimum 90 days with current operator, no outstanding dues with current provider, account must be under your name (NIC verification). Benefits: Keep your familiar number, switch to better LankaTel network and rates, no need to inform contacts. Cannot port if under contract obligations with current operator.

Activate multiple SIM connections for corporate accounts: 1) Contact LankaTel enterprise team: Call 1237 or email enterprise@lankatel.lk. 2) Minimum 10 connections required for bulk corporate rates. 3) Required documents: Company registration certificate, authorized signatory letter on company letterhead, employee list with NIC photocopies, Board resolution (for large orders). 4) Choose from corporate data plans: Basic (5GB - LKR 800/month), Standard (15GB - LKR 1,500/month), Premium (50GB - LKR 2,800/month), Unlimited (LKR 4,500/month). 5) Processing time: 3-5 business days for verification and approval. 6) SIM cards delivered to registered office address. 7) All SIMs pre-activated and ready to use immediately. 8) Access to corporate admin portal for centralized management. 9) Volume discounts: 10-25 SIMs (10% off), 26-50 SIMs (15% off), 51-100 SIMs (20% off), 100+ SIMs (25% off). 10) Single consolidated monthly invoice for all connections. Popular among companies in Colombo business districts, BPOs in Kandy. Includes complimentary device management app for implementing corporate security policies.

My.lankatel.lk self-care portal comprehensive features overview: Dashboard section - Real-time balance display, current data usage meter, active packages list, quick action buttons. Billing section - View/download bills (24 months history), payment history with receipts, auto-pay configuration, bill delivery preferences (email/SMS/post). Packages section - Browse all available data/voice/combo packages, activate instantly, view active subscriptions, manage auto-renewal settings. Usage section - Detailed call logs with numbers and durations, data session history by app, SMS count and recipients, hourly/daily/monthly usage breakdowns, customizable usage alert setup. Account section - Update profile information, change password, notification preferences management, linked accounts overview. Support section - Live chat with agents (9 AM-9 PM daily), ticket submission and tracking, searchable FAQ database, downloadable forms, service center locator map. Payment section - Multiple payment methods: debit/credit card, bank transfer, mobile wallets, instant payment confirmation, save cards for future use. Reports section - Generate custom date range reports for business, export data to Excel/PDF formats. Mobile-optimized responsive design works seamlessly on smartphones. Quick login via QR code from MyLankaTel app. All transactions encrypted with 256-bit SSL security.

LankaTel VIP account tier benefits with automatic qualification based on monthly spend: Silver Tier (LKR 3,000+ monthly for 6 consecutive months): Priority customer care hotline with reduced wait time, 5% discount on all data packages, complimentary SIM replacement, quarterly account review. Gold Tier (LKR 7,000+ monthly for 6 consecutive months): Dedicated relationship manager assigned, 10% discount on all packages, airport lounge access (2 visits per year at BIA Colombo), device insurance discount 25%, priority network access during peak hours, free international roaming activation fee waiver. Platinum Tier (LKR 15,000+ monthly for 12 consecutive months): Personal account concierge service, 15% discount on all packages, unlimited airport lounge access year-round, complimentary device insurance, priority technical support with guaranteed 2-hour response, exclusive preview access to new services, invitation to VIP customer events. Additional benefits across all tiers: Faster service at all service centers (dedicated VIP counters in Colombo Fort, Kandy City), waived late fee once per year, automatically higher credit limits, birthday month special offers. Check current tier status in MyLankaTel app > Profile > Membership Tier. Must maintain monthly spend threshold to retain tier benefits. Tier status reviewed quarterly.

Verify student status for special student packages and educational discounts: 1) Eligibility criteria: Age between 16-25 years, currently enrolled in recognized educational institution in Sri Lanka (school, college, university). 2) Visit LankaTel service center with required documents: Valid student ID card with photo, university/school admission letter or enrollment confirmation, original NIC or birth certificate. 3) Submit clear photocopies of all documents. 4) Verification processing: 24-48 hours for approval. 5) Student status validity: 1 academic year, requires annual reverification with updated documents. 6) Special student benefits: Exclusive student data packages (30GB - LKR 600, 50GB - LKR 900), educational app data completely free (Zoom, Google Classroom, Microsoft Teams, Moodle), device purchase discounts up to 15% off retail price, complimentary SIM card activation (LKR 300 value). 7) Family discount program: Parents get additional 10% discount when linked to verified student account. 8) Available at major educational institutions: University of Colombo, University of Peradeniya, SLIIT, NSBM, and 50+ recognized schools and colleges. Special on-campus verification drives conducted at campuses in Colombo and Kandy each semester start. Online verification portal launching in Q2 2024.

Exclusive benefits and concessions for senior citizens aged 60 and above: 1) Visit any LankaTel service center with original NIC showing date of birth (age 60+ years). 2) Verification immediate upon document check. 3) Senior citizen benefits package: 20% discount on all voice-focused packages, dedicated senior customer care line with minimal wait times (priority queue), priority token service at all service centers, free home installation for fiber connections (normally LKR 1,500 charge), simplified large-font billing statements, quarterly courtesy voice calls from relationship team. 4) Special senior-friendly plans optimized for voice: Basic Talk (300 minutes - LKR 400/month), Standard Talk (1000 minutes - LKR 800/month), both include 5GB bonus data. 5) Emergency assistance features: Speed dial setup for family contacts, medical alert contact list, location sharing capability with trusted family members. 6) Free SIM card delivery to home address in Colombo, Kandy, Galle metro areas. 7) Community assistance programs: Free smartphone training sessions at community centers, monthly technology support workshops, one-on-one tutoring available. 8) Family Connect feature: Linked family members can receive usage alerts and remotely top-up account balance. Popular among retired professionals, pensioners, and elderly living alone. No expiry on senior citizen concession status - valid for lifetime once age verified.

Temporarily freeze your account immediately for security concerns: 1) Use when: SIM card lost or stolen, unauthorized usage suspected on account, traveling abroad and want to prevent fraudulent use. 2) Immediate freeze options: Call 1234 hotline (24/7 available) and request emergency account freeze, or use MyLankaTel app: Security menu > Freeze Account (requires biometric or PIN confirmation). 3) Freeze effects: All outgoing calls/SMS/data completely blocked, incoming calls and SMS continue to work normally, emergency calls (119 Police, 118 Ambulance) always remain available. 4) No usage charges incurred during freeze period. 5) Unfreeze process: Call 1234 hotline with security verification questions, or use MyLankaTel app with biometric authentication. 6) If SIM stolen: Report incident to nearest police station within 24 hours, request permanent SIM block and replacement. 7) SIM replacement procedure: Visit service center with original NIC and police report copy, pay replacement fee LKR 300, same mobile number retained, new SIM issued within 30 minutes. 8) Review complete account activity log before unfreezing to check for suspicious transactions. Account freeze helps prevent: Financial losses from fraudulent usage, unauthorized international roaming charges, personal data breaches. Use liberally when any suspicious activity suspected - absolutely no penalty for false alarms. Better safe than sorry.

Create and comprehensively manage family plan for multiple users: 1) Primary account holder initiates via MyLankaTel app > Family Plans > Create New Plan. 2) Add up to 5 family members (all must be existing LankaTel users). 3) Members receive invitation SMS notification, must accept to join plan. 4) Choose plan structure type: Shared Data Pool (all members share one large data bucket), Individual Allocations (each member gets fixed separate data amount), Hybrid Model (shared pool + individual allowances for each). 5) Popular family plan configurations: Family Basic (4 members, 100GB shared pool - LKR 3,500/month), Family Plus (5 members, 200GB shared pool - LKR 6,000/month), Family Premium (5 members, 500GB shared pool + 10GB individual for each - LKR 12,000/month). 6) Primary holder management controls: Add or remove family members, allocate data distribution, set individual usage limits per member, receive consolidated monthly bill, view complete usage breakdown. 7) Advanced parental controls available: Block adult content filtering, set time-based usage restrictions, app-specific usage limits for members under 18 years. 8) Each family member retains their individual mobile number and can independently check own usage statistics. 9) Significant cost savings: 30-40% cheaper compared to individual standalone plans. Most popular among multi-device households in Colombo suburbs, Kandy, Negombo residential areas with 4-5 family members.

Switch to paperless electronic billing for convenience and environmental sustainability: 1) Enrollment: MyLankaTel app > Billing section > Go Paperless button, or my.lankatel.lk portal. 2) Verify email address via OTP code sent to registered email. 3) Bills delivered digitally via: Email (detailed PDF attachment), SMS (summary with secure download link), App push notification with instant view. 4) Key benefits: Bills available 3 days earlier than postal delivery, complete 24-month archive accessible online anytime, instant download capability anytime anywhere, powerful search functionality through past bills, measurable environmental contribution. 5) Enrollment incentive: One-time LKR 50 account credit upon first enrollment, plus monthly bonus 500MB data for all paperless users. 6) Bill format options: Detailed PDF identical to paper bill format, additional interactive HTML format within app with charts. 7) Automatic payment reminders: 7 days before due date, 3 days before, on actual due date. 8) Flexibility: Option to receive paper bills for specific months (useful for expense claims or audits). 9) Revert to paper bills: Requires 30-day advance notice if you want to switch back. 10) Corporate accounts: Consolidated paperless billing available with detailed departmental breakdown. Currently over 60% of LankaTel customers now paperless. Bills automatically backed up to LankaTel Cloud if subscribed. Every 100 paperless enrollments, LankaTel plants one tree as part of Green initiative.

content: Set up comprehensive usage monitoring with intelligent alerts: Configure in MyLankaTel app > Usage section > Configure Alerts. Alert categories available: Data alerts (trigger at 50%, 75%, 90%, 100% of package limit), Voice minute alerts (notify when minutes running low), SMS alerts (warn when approaching limit), Bill amount alerts (when approaching credit limit threshold), Roaming alerts (immediate notification when roaming activates). Notification delivery methods: Push notification to app, SMS text message, Email to registered address. Real-time usage dashboard displays: Current active session data consumption, Top 10 data-consuming apps with percentages, Peak usage times analysis by hour, Projected month-end usage forecast based on patterns. Advanced monitoring features: Set hard usage caps (automatically disable data when limit reached), App-specific data limits (example: allow social media maximum 5GB per month), Time-based automatic restrictions (disable mobile data 11 PM-6 AM to prevent overnight usage), Family member monitoring (parents can view children's detailed usage). Historical trend analysis tools: Compare current month vs previous months, Identify usage anomalies and sudden spikes, Optimize package selection recommendations based on actual usage patterns. Corporate-specific features: Department-wise usage breakdown and reporting, Employee usage comparisons and rankings, Cost center allocation for accounting, Departmental budget alerts and controls. All monitoring updates happen in real-time with refresh every 5 minutes. Export detailed usage reports to Excel format for further analysis. Industry recommendation: Set conservative alerts at 80% threshold for data packages to avoid unexpected bill shock and overage charges.

Comprehensive steps to protect data when phone is lost or stolen: Immediate emergency actions: 1) Call 1234 from another phone immediately - request instant service suspension to prevent unauthorized usage. 2) Access MyLankaTel web portal from any computer: Login > Security section > Suspend Service button. 3) Service suspended within 5 minutes - completely prevents all unauthorized calls, SMS, data usage. 4) File police report within 24 hours of discovery (required for insurance claims). Data protection measures: 1) If Find My Device previously enabled: Use Google Find My Device or Apple Find My iPhone to remotely lock device and erase all data. 2) LankaTel Cloud automatic backup: Access backed up photos, contacts, messages, call logs from any other device via my.lankatel.lk/cloud. 3) Request temporary call forwarding: Forward all incoming calls to another temporary number while obtaining replacement device. SIM replacement comprehensive process: 1) Visit nearest service center with original NIC and police report copy. 2) New SIM card issued for LKR 300 fee with exact same mobile number retained. 3) Immediate activation typically completed within 15-30 minutes. 4) Note: WhatsApp, banking apps, other services will require complete reverification with OTP. Device on installment plan: Insurance claim covers remaining balance if theft properly reported with police documentation. Monitor for unauthorized usage: Carefully check account activity in portal for any suspicious transactions during lost period. File dispute for any fraudulent charges if unauthorized usage occurred. Prevention best practices for future: Always enable SIM lock PIN (required on every device restart), backup important data regularly to LankaTel Cloud, maintain record of device IMEI number separately in safe place.

Activate affordable international calling packages for significant savings over standard rates: Standard IDD rates without package: LKR 25-85 per minute depending on destination country. Money-saving IDD Package options: SAARC Countries Pack (India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Maldives, Nepal): 100 minutes - LKR 500, 300 minutes - LKR 1,200. Middle East Pack (UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Oman): 50 minutes - LKR 600, 150 minutes - LKR 1,500. Global Premium Pack (USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Europe): 30 minutes - LKR 750, 100 minutes - LKR 2,000. Package activation methods: Dial convenient USSD code *#130# for complete IDD menu, select desired country bundle, or use MyLankaTel app > International section > Select specific country bundle. Validity period: All packages valid 30 days from activation date. Bonus features included: Free country-specific SMS (10 SMS per day to package countries), voicemail service for missed international calls, optional call recording feature. Money-saving tips: Make calls during Sri Lankan off-peak hours (after 9 PM) to receive 20% bonus minutes, WhatsApp or Viber calling over data connection often more economical for very long calls, combine with night data packages for cost-effective video calls. Most popular packages: India package (large Sri Lankan diaspora community maintains family connections), Middle East package (migrant workers' families stay connected). Real-time tracking: App displays remaining package minutes in real-time. Convenient auto-renewal: Package automatically renews each month if sufficient balance available (can be disabled in settings).

Monitor all account activities comprehensively for enhanced security: Access activity log in MyLankaTel app > Security section > Activity Log displays complete history showing: Login history (precise date, time, device type, geographic location, IP address), Password change events, Profile information updates, Package activations and deactivations, SIM card changes and replacements, All payment transactions, Settings modifications, Customer care interaction records, Plan and subscription changes. Each individual log entry includes comprehensive details: Exact timestamp of action, Specific action taken description, Device used for action, Success or failure status, IP address and approximate location, User agent information. Suspicious activity automatic indicators flag: Login attempt from previously unknown location, Multiple consecutive failed login attempts, Account changes you did not authorize or make, Unusual package activations outside normal pattern. Proactive security automatic alerts sent via email for: Login from completely new device, Password successfully changed, High-value financial transaction exceeding LKR 5,000, SIM card replaced, Critical account settings modified. Security best practices - review log frequency: Weekly review minimum for personal accounts, Daily review recommended for corporate accounts. Export complete log: Download comprehensive 90-day activity history as PDF or Excel format for detailed security audit. Immediate actions if suspicious activity detected: 1) Change account password immediately to strong unique password. 2) Enable two-factor authentication if not already active for added security layer. 3) Call 1234 security hotline to report incident and get assistance. 4) Temporarily freeze account to prevent further unauthorized access. Log retention policy: 90 days available online for immediate access, 24 months archived (request via customer support for older records). Corporate accounts receive enhanced detailed audit trails with individual user-level action tracking for regulatory compliance requirements. Comprehensive activity log monitoring helps identify and prevent unauthorized account access before any significant damage or financial loss occurs.

topic_tamil: நண்பர்கள் மற்றும் குடும்பத்தினருக்கு பரிசு தரவு பரிமாற்றம்
content: Transfer data as gift to friends and family members: Feature availability: Works for both prepaid and postpaid LankaTel users. How to send gift data: 1) MyLankaTel app > Gift Data section > Enter recipient's LankaTel mobile number. 2) Choose gift amount from options: 500MB (LKR 25), 1GB (LKR 45), 2GB (LKR 85), 5GB (LKR 200), 10GB (LKR 380). 3) Add optional personal message for recipient (up to 100 characters). 4) Confirm transaction and complete payment. 5) Recipient immediately receives SMS notification with gifted data automatically credited to their account. Alternative quick USSD method: Dial *#131*recipient_number*amount_code# from your phone. Example: *#131*0771234567*1# to send 1GB. Usage limits and restrictions: Maximum 10GB data per single transaction, Maximum 50GB total gifts per calendar month, Minimum account age 30 days to send gifts. Validity: Gifted data valid for 7 days from receipt date. Recipient options: Accept (data auto-credited immediately), Decline (full refund processed to sender within 24 hours). Popular gifting occasions: Birthday celebrations, Sinhala and Tamil New Year festivities, Religious holidays, Emergency assistance when family member runs out of data. Payment methods: Postpaid users - gifts charged to next monthly bill, Prepaid users - deducted from current balance. Gift tracking: Complete sent and received gift history visible in app. Corporate bulk feature: Companies can gift data to employees as rewards (contact 1237 enterprise team). Important notes: Gifts cannot be exchanged for cash value, Gifted data consumed first before regular package data, Great way to help family members mid-month when they exhaust their data allowance.

Comprehensive corporate expense tracking and management tools via MyLankaTel Business Portal: Department allocation features: Assign individual connections to specific departments or cost centers, view consolidated department-wise monthly spending reports. Employee management capabilities: Add or remove employees from system, set individual employee spending limits, configure approval workflows for limit increase requests. Budget control mechanisms: Set monthly spending budgets per department or cost center, receive automatic alerts at 80% and 100% budget utilization, implement automatic service speed limitations when budget exceeded. Advanced reporting features: Generate monthly expense reports categorized by department, access employee-level detailed call records, GL code integration for seamless accounting system import, powerful custom report builder with filters. ERP system integration: Direct export to Tally accounting software, QuickBooks integration, SAP interface, Oracle Financials connector, RESTful API available for custom ERP integration. Comprehensive approval system workflows: Package activations exceeding LKR 1,000 require manager approval, international roaming requests require administrator approval, device purchases need C-level executive approval. Tax compliance documentation: Detailed VAT breakdown on invoices, withholding tax certificates generation, TDS documentation for tax filing. Complete audit trail maintenance: Comprehensive transaction history logging, modification and change logs, user access activity records for compliance. Multi-level hierarchical access control: Admin role (full unrestricted control), Manager role (department view and limited actions), Finance role (billing and reports only), Employee role (self-view only). Real-time management dashboards showing: Current month cumulative spending, top spender employees ranking, budget utilization percentages, spending trend analysis graphs. Dedicated enterprise account manager provides quarterly in-person business reviews and optimization recommendations. Most popular among large companies in Colombo business districts, BPO operations in Kandy and Galle outsourcing hubs.

topic: Data Rollover Policy and Eligibility Rules
topic_sinhala: දත්ත පෙරළීමේ ප්‍රතිපත්තිය සහ සුදුසුකම් රීති

content: Comprehensive understanding of data rollover policies for unused data: Eligible package types: Monthly data packages 10GB and above, family shared data pools, all corporate business plans. Detailed rollover rules explained: Unused data from current billing month automatically carries forward to next month, maximum rollover amount limited to 50% of original package size (example: 20GB package allows maximum 10GB rollover), rolled over data expires at end of following month if not consumed, system prioritizes using rolled data after consuming current month's fresh data allocation. Practical rollover example: January: Purchased 20GB package, actually used only 15GB. Result: 5GB rolls over to February. February: Have 20GB new allocation + 5GB rolled = 25GB total available. Rolled 5GB must be used by February end or expires. Important requirement: Must activate same tier or higher package in following month for rollover to apply. Package types NOT eligible for rollover: Daily data packages, weekly data packages, promotional or specially discounted packages, time-based packages (night-only, weekend-only). View rollover balance: MyLankaTel app > Data section > Rollover Balance screen displays: Fresh current month data allocation, Rolled over data from previous month, Total data available for use, Exact rolled data expiry date. Strategies to maximize rollover benefit: Regularly monitor usage throughout month, activate higher tier package before current package expires, allow system to automatically use rolled data first prioritization. Postpaid accounts: Fully automatic rollover if plan remains unchanged month-to-month. Prepaid accounts: Must activate same or higher package within 7 days of previous package expiry. Rollover does NOT apply after: Plan downgrade to lower tier, service suspension or temporary disconnection, account type conversion between prepaid and postpaid. Most beneficial for users with highly variable month-to-month usage patterns who sometimes underutilize their data allocation.

Access comprehensive priority customer support through multiple channels: Standard support channel: Call 1234 (available 24/7 year-round), average wait time 5-10 minutes for general queue. Tier-based priority hotlines: Gold and Platinum VIP members: Dial 1234 then press 1 for immediate priority routing (average wait under 2 minutes), corporate business accounts: Dedicated line 1237 for enterprise support, device financing customers: Automatic priority queue placement in standard line. Premium digital support channels: In-app live chat: Gold tier and above members get priority agent assignment and faster response, video call support: Available specifically for complex fiber installation issues and corporate account management, WhatsApp business support: Message +94 71 234 1234 (officially verified business account, guaranteed response under 1 hour during business hours), Email support premium: premium@lankatel.lk exclusively for VIP customer tier inquiries. Convenient callback service option: Request callback instead of waiting on hold, schedule callback for convenient time slot, guaranteed callback within specified committed timeframe. Physical service center VIP experience: Dedicated VIP customer lounges in Colombo Fort flagship and Kandy City Center locations, separate express service counters in all major city service centers (token priority system), appointment booking system available via app to avoid any wait time. Social media support channels: Twitter: Tweet @LankaTelCare for public assistance, Facebook Messenger: Direct message for support, Instagram DM: Support via direct message, all channels actively monitored 9 AM-9 PM daily, public response guaranteed within 1 hour. Technical support escalation hierarchy: Level 1: Frontline general support agents (dial 1235), Level 2: Specialized technical support specialists, Level 3: Senior network engineers available within 24 hours for critical infrastructure issues. Customer satisfaction quality assurance: Rate every support interaction experience, poor satisfaction ratings automatically escalate to supervisory management review for service recovery, feedback directly impacts agent performance metrics.

Trade in your old device for instant credit towards new purchase: Eligible devices: Smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, laptops purchased from LankaTel or any brand. Complete assessment process: 1) Visit authorized LankaTel retail store in Colombo Fort, Kandy City Center, Galle Main Street, or Negombo. 2) Trained technician thoroughly inspects device checking: Screen condition and any cracks, full functionality of all features, battery health percentage, physical damage assessment, water damage indicators. 3) Receive instant valuation quote based on device model, age, and assessed condition. 4) Accept quote - credit applied immediately to new device purchase transaction. Device condition grading system: Excellent condition (like new, zero scratches): 70-80% of original retail value, Good condition (minor cosmetic wear, fully functional): 50-65% of market value, Fair condition (visible wear and tear, works properly): 30-45% of value, Poor condition (cracked screen or issues, still functional): 10-25% of remaining value. Recent popular trade-in examples with typical values: iPhone 11 Pro 256GB (excellent condition) - LKR 75,000-95,000 credit, Samsung Galaxy S21 128GB (good condition) - LKR 45,000-65,000 credit, iPhone XR 64GB (fair condition) - LKR 35,000-50,000 credit, Huawei P30 (good condition) - LKR 25,000-35,000 credit. Mandatory requirements for trade-in acceptance: Device must power on and boot properly, no active iCloud lock (iPhone) or Google account lock (Android), factory reset must be completed before trade-in, original accessories (box, charger, earphones) significantly increase trade-in value. Flexible credit usage options: Apply credit directly to new or certified refurbished device purchase, convert to LankaTel account credit for bills and packages, use credit for purchasing accessories, headphones, cases. Important notes: Credit cannot be redeemed as cash, credit valid for 90 days from issue date. Environmental responsibility: All traded devices either professionally refurbished for resale or responsibly recycled, certified by national e-waste management authority. Special premium trade-in events conducted quarterly with enhanced bonus valuation offers.

topic: Formal Complaint Escalation Process and Path
topic_tamil: முறையான புகார் அதிகரிப்பு செயல்முறை மற்றும் பாதை
content: Comprehensive escalation path for unresolved complaints through proper channels: Level 1 - Frontline Customer Support: Initial contact: Call 1234 and describe complete issue with details, receive unique ticket reference number for tracking, expected resolution timeline: 24-48 hours, follow-up courtesy call from support team to confirm resolution. Level 2 - Supervisor Escalation: If still unresolved after 48 hours: Request supervisor escalation via phone, or email complaints@lankatel.lk including ticket reference number, reference all previous interaction details and attempts, expected resolution timeline: 3-5 business days with more thorough investigation. Level 3 - Customer Relations Manager: Issue persists after Level 2: Call 1234 specifically requesting transfer to CRM department, or email directly: crm@lankatel.lk with priority flag, provide comprehensive information package: complete timeline of issue from start, all ticket reference numbers from previous attempts, all supporting documents and evidence, expected resolution timeline: 5-7 business days, senior manager contacts you directly via phone call. Level 4 - Senior Executive Management: Final internal escalation as last resort before external: Write detailed formal complaint to customercare@lankatel.lk, mark email subject line 'ESCALATION - Attention: Head of Customer Service', include exhaustive detailed complaint documentation with all evidence collected, resolution timeline: 7-10 business days maximum, senior leadership team personally reviews case. External Escalation - Telecommunications Regulatory Commission (TRC): Only after all 4 internal channels completely exhausted: File official complaint at trc.gov.lk online portal, provide absolutely all LankaTel ticket numbers and email correspondence copies, TRC acts as neutral mediator between customer and LankaTel, TRC resolution is legally binding on both parties. Critical documentation best practices: Maintain screenshots of all interactions, save complete call log history, archive all email correspondence, note down all ticket reference numbers, record exact dates and times of every interaction, document names of all agents spoken with. Industry statistics: Majority of complaints successfully resolved by Level 2 escalation, TRC external escalation extremely rare (less than 1% of total complaints filed).

Comprehensively manage multiple connected devices on single account: MyLankaTel supports registration of multiple device types: Primary device (main smartphone), secondary devices (tablet, smartwatch, laptop with data-capable SIM card). Device registration process: 1) MyLankaTel app > Devices menu > Add New Device. 2) Enter device IMEI number manually or scan device barcode. 3) Assign friendly nickname for easy identification (examples: 'Work Laptop', 'iPad Pro', 'Galaxy Watch'). 4) Optionally set specific data allocation per device for granular control. Powerful device management features: View real-time data usage breakdown per individual device, set individual usage limits for each registered device, remotely enable or disable data access for specific device, track device approximate location (requires device consent and GPS), receive instant alerts for unusual device activity patterns. Flexible data sharing models: Single unified data pool shared across all registered devices, or allocate specific fixed amount to each device individually (example: smartphone gets 20GB, tablet allocated 10GB from total 30GB plan). eSIM technology support: Add eSIM-capable devices without requiring physical SIM card, instant QR code provisioning directly via app, immediate activation without service center visit. Wearable smartwatch integration: NumberShare technology: Share your phone number between smartphone and smartwatch, make and receive calls directly from watch using phone's number, separate independent data usage tracking for watch. Corporate IT administration: IT administrators can centrally manage entire employee device fleet, MDM (Mobile Device Management) platform integration, enforce company-wide security policies across all registered devices, remote wipe capability for lost corporate devices. System limits: Maximum 5 devices per individual account. Flexibility: Remove any device from account anytime instantly. Primary device designation receives all account notifications and alerts. Most popular use case: Professionals with multiple devices (phone, tablet, laptop) and families sharing tablet device.

topic: Loyalty Rewards Points Program Complete Guide
topic_sinhala: පක්ෂපාති ත්‍යාග ලකුණු වැඩසටහන සම්පූර්ණ මාර්ගෝපදේශය
topic_tamil: விசுவாச வெகுமதி புள்ளிகள் திட்டம் முழு வழிகாட்டி
content: Complete guide to earning and redeeming LankaTel Loyalty Reward Points: Comprehensive earning opportunities: Every LKR 100 spent on bills or packages = 10 loyalty points earned, bill payments (prepaid top-ups and postpaid bills), data and voice package activations, device purchases from LankaTel stores, customer referrals (500 bonus points per successful referral who stays active 30 days), account longevity (1000 anniversary bonus points per completed year of service), paperless e-billing enrollment (50 points earned every month). Accelerated bonus earning periods: Double points during special promotional campaign periods, extra 2x multiplier points earned during your birthday month, Gold tier members earn 1.5x points on everything, Platinum tier members earn 2x points on all transactions. Flexible redemption catalog options: Data packages (500 points redeems 1GB high-speed data), voice minutes (300 points redeems 100 calling minutes), direct bill discount (1000 points = LKR 100 off next bill), physical accessories (wireless earbuds, chargers, power banks, phone cases), premium services (airport lounge day passes, device insurance discount vouchers), charitable donation (support approved NGOs and causes with points). Points valuation: Approximately 1000 points = LKR 100 equivalent value across redemption options. Simple redemption process: Open MyLankaTel app > Rewards section > Browse complete catalog, select desired item or discount, confirm redemption, instant credit for digital items, 3-5 business days delivery for physical merchandise. Points validity policy: Earned points remain valid for 12 months from earning date, any account activity extends validity of all points, expired points are non-refundable and cannot be reinstated. Real-time balance tracking: App dashboard prominently displays current points balance, complete earning history with transaction details, upcoming expiry dates for different point batches. Special promotional campaigns: Seasonal bonus point events (Avurudu, Christmas with triple points), milestone achievement rewards (bonus at 5000, 10000 point levels). Industry statistics: Popular redemption preferences: Data packages (60% of redemptions), accessories (25%), bill discounts (15%). Average active customer earns 2000-5000 points annually through normal usage.

Complete Know Your Customer (KYC) verification for account security: 1) Visit service center with original NIC (National Identity Card). 2) Provide proof of address: Utility bill, bank statement, or rental agreement (not older than 3 months). 3) For business accounts: Company registration certificate, authorized signatory letter, business address proof. 4) Biometric verification: Fingerprint scan at service center. 5) Photo capture for account profile. 6) Processing time: Immediate verification for standard accounts, 24-48 hours for corporate accounts. 7) Benefits of verified account: Higher credit limits, faster service approvals, enhanced security protection, eligibility for premium services. 8) Re-verification required: Every 3 years for personal accounts, annually for business accounts, or when significant account changes occur. 9) Documents must be clear, legible, and match registered account details exactly.

Check your account balance through multiple convenient methods: 1) MyLankaTel app: Open app > Dashboard shows real-time balance, data remaining, active packages. 2) USSD code: Dial *#123# from your LankaTel number for instant balance SMS. 3) Online portal: Login to my.lankatel.lk > Account Overview section. 4) SMS inquiry: Send 'BAL' to 1234 from registered number. 5) Call center: Dial 1234 and select balance inquiry option (requires account PIN for security). 6) Service center: Visit any LankaTel service center with NIC for balance printout. 7) Balance information includes: Available credit (postpaid), account balance (prepaid), data remaining, voice minutes remaining, SMS count, package expiry dates. 8) Real-time updates: Balance updates immediately after transactions, package activations, or payments. 9) Historical balance: View balance history for past 3 months in app under Account History section.

Merge multiple LankaTel accounts into single unified account: 1) Eligibility: All numbers must be registered under same NIC. 2) Visit service center with original NIC and list of all numbers to merge. 3) Choose primary account: One number becomes main account, others become supplementary. 4) Benefits: Single monthly bill, unified data pool, easier management, cost savings. 5) Processing time: 24-48 hours for account merge completion. 6) Important considerations: Outstanding balances on all accounts must be cleared before merge, active contracts on individual accounts remain valid, device installments continue separately. 7) After merge: All numbers retain functionality, primary account holder receives consolidated bill, supplementary numbers cannot make account changes independently. 8) Cannot merge: Accounts with different ownership (different NICs), accounts with pending disputes, accounts under suspension. 9) Reversal: Account separation possible but requires 30-day notice and service center visit.

Request temporary account hold or payment arrangement during financial difficulties: 1) Contact 1234 billing department before account suspension. 2) Payment arrangement options: Extended payment plan (spread outstanding over 2-3 months), Partial payment agreement (pay minimum to maintain service), Temporary hold (freeze account for 1 month, no usage charges). 3) Eligibility: Account active minimum 6 months, good payment history previously, genuine financial hardship demonstrated. 4) Required documents: Income proof, bank statements, hardship letter explaining situation. 5) Approval process: Review takes 24-48 hours, approved arrangements documented in account. 6) Terms: Must maintain minimum monthly payment, service continues during arrangement, late fees may be waived. 7) Default consequences: If arrangement terms not met, account suspended immediately, reconnection fee applies. 8) Maximum arrangements: One per 12-month period. 9) Alternative: Temporary service suspension (LKR 200/month) if unable to make any payments.

Reactivate account after extended period of inactivity: 1) Account status after 90 days inactive: Service suspended, number reserved for 6 months. 2) After 6 months: Number may be released back to pool, account marked dormant. 3) Recovery process: Call 1234 or visit service center with original NIC. 4) Verification required: Identity confirmation, address verification, security questions. 5) Outstanding balance: Must clear any remaining dues from inactive period. 6) Reactivation fee: LKR 500 for accounts inactive over 6 months. 7) Number recovery: If number still available, same number restored. If number released, new number assigned. 8) Plan restoration: Previous plan may not be available, choose from current plan options. 9) Timeline: Immediate reactivation if number available, 24-48 hours if new number required. 10) Prevention: Maintain minimum activity (one call or SMS every 90 days) to keep account active.

Resolve account lockout situations: Common lockout causes: Multiple failed login attempts (3 wrong passwords), suspicious activity detected, security breach suspected, account PIN entered incorrectly 3 times. Resolution steps: 1) Wait period: Automatic unlock after 30 minutes for failed login attempts. 2) Immediate unlock: Call 1234 with account verification (NIC number, registered email, security questions). 3) App unlock: Use 'Forgot Password' feature if locked due to password issues. 4) Service center: Visit with original NIC for immediate manual unlock. 5) Security reset: If compromised, full security reset required (new password, new PIN, 2FA re-setup). 6) Prevention: Enable biometric login, use strong unique password, enable 2FA, never share credentials. 7) Lockout types: Temporary (auto-unlocks), Permanent (requires customer service intervention). 8) After unlock: Review account activity log for unauthorized access, change password immediately if suspicious activity found. 9) Corporate accounts: IT administrator can unlock employee accounts via admin portal.

Customize account settings and preferences: Language preferences: Choose Sinhala, Tamil, or English for all communications, app interface, bills, SMS notifications. Communication preferences: Preferred contact method (SMS, email, phone call), quiet hours for notifications, frequency of promotional messages. Billing preferences: Paper or paperless billing, billing cycle date preference, payment reminder timing. Service preferences: Default package auto-renewal settings, usage alert thresholds, data speed preferences. Privacy settings: Share usage data for service improvement (opt-in), marketing communications consent, third-party data sharing controls. Accessibility features: Large font option, voice navigation, high contrast mode. Notification channels: Enable/disable SMS, email, push notifications per category. Profile customization: Display name, profile picture, account nickname. Save preferences: All settings saved automatically, sync across devices, can be changed anytime through app or portal. Export preferences: Download current settings as backup file.

Access comprehensive account history and transaction records: View transaction history: MyLankaTel app > History section shows all account activities. Transaction types recorded: Package activations and deactivations, payment transactions (successful and failed), plan changes, account modifications, customer service interactions, device purchases, SIM replacements. Date range: View transactions from account creation date, filter by date range, search by transaction type. Export transactions: Download as PDF or Excel, email to registered address, print for records. Detailed information: Transaction date and time, amount, payment method, reference number, status (successful/pending/failed), description. Payment history: Complete payment log with receipts, failed payment reasons, refund transactions, adjustments and credits. Package history: All activated packages with dates, amounts, validity periods, usage statistics. Account changes log: Password changes, profile updates, setting modifications, security changes. Retention period: Online access to 24 months history, older records available on request. Corporate accounts: Enhanced history with employee-level transaction tracking.

Essential security practices to protect your LankaTel account: Password security: Use strong unique password (minimum 12 characters, mix of letters, numbers, symbols), change password every 90 days, never share password with anyone, use password manager for secure storage. Two-factor authentication: Enable 2FA for all accounts, use authenticator app for better security than SMS, keep backup codes in safe place. Account PIN: Set 4-digit PIN for account changes, memorize PIN, never write down or share. Regular monitoring: Review account activity log weekly, check for unauthorized transactions, monitor usage patterns for anomalies. Device security: Enable device lock screen, use biometric authentication, keep apps updated, install security updates promptly. Phishing protection: Never click suspicious links in SMS or email, LankaTel never asks for full password or PIN, verify sender before responding, report phishing attempts to 1234. Public Wi-Fi: Avoid accessing account on public networks, use VPN if necessary, log out after use. Account recovery: Keep recovery email and phone updated, set security questions with memorable answers, maintain backup contact information.

Understand account upgrade eligibility and complete upgrade process: Upgrade types: Plan upgrade (higher data/voice limits), account tier upgrade (Silver to Gold, Gold to Platinum), service upgrade (prepaid to postpaid, standard to premium). Eligibility criteria: Account active minimum 3-6 months depending on upgrade type, good payment history (no defaults), sufficient credit score for postpaid upgrades, meet minimum usage requirements for tier upgrades. Upgrade process: 1) Check eligibility in MyLankaTel app > Account > Upgrade Options. 2) Review upgrade benefits and costs. 3) Submit upgrade request via app, call 1234, or visit service center. 4) Credit evaluation for postpaid upgrades (24-48 hours). 5) Approval notification via SMS and email. 6) Upgrade activation: Immediate for plan upgrades, next billing cycle for account tier changes. Benefits: Higher data limits, better rates, priority support, additional features. Costs: May require security deposit for postpaid, early upgrade fees if in contract, pro-rated charges. Downgrade policy: Can downgrade after 30 days notice, early downgrade fees may apply.

Backup account data and export information: Data export options: MyLankaTel app > Settings > Export Data. Exportable information: Complete call logs with numbers and durations, SMS history, data usage statistics, billing history, payment records, package activation history, account settings. Export formats: PDF (for printing and archiving), Excel (for analysis and spreadsheet use), CSV (for database import), JSON (for technical use). Automatic backups: LankaTel Cloud automatic backup for contacts, photos, messages (if subscribed), scheduled monthly account summary email. Manual backup: Export data anytime through app, no limit on export frequency, all exports free of charge. Backup storage: Save exports to device, email to yourself, upload to cloud storage, print physical copies. Data retention: Account data retained for 24 months after account closure, exports available during active account period. Corporate accounts: Bulk export for all employee accounts, automated monthly reports. Privacy: All exports encrypted, password-protected PDFs available, secure download links valid for 7 days.

Port your LankaTel number to another operator: Eligibility requirements: Account active minimum 90 days, no outstanding dues, account in good standing, no active contract obligations. Porting process: 1) Contact new operator and request number porting. 2) Receive UPC (Unique Porting Code) from new operator. 3) Clear all LankaTel outstanding balances (mandatory). 4) Visit LankaTel service center with NIC and UPC to authorize porting. 5) Porting fee: LKR 500 charged by new operator. 6) Processing time: 3-5 business days for porting completion. 7) During porting: Service continues normally until porting completes. 8) Porting completion: SMS notification sent, insert new operator SIM card. Important considerations: Final bill generated after porting, security deposit refund processed within 14 days, device installments must be cleared or transferred, cannot port if account suspended or barred. Postpaid accounts: Complete final billing cycle before porting, early termination fees may apply if in contract. Prepaid accounts: Remaining balance forfeited upon porting (use balance before porting). Number retention: Number retained during porting process, no service interruption.

Benefits based on account age and loyalty: Account age tiers: New customer (0-6 months), Established (6-12 months), Loyal (1-3 years), Long-term (3-5 years), Legacy (5+ years). Automatic benefits: Loyalty points bonus on account anniversary, reduced fees for long-term customers, priority customer service for established accounts, special offers exclusive to loyal customers. Anniversary rewards: 1 year: 1000 bonus loyalty points, 2 years: 2000 points + 5% discount on packages, 3 years: 3000 points + 10% discount, 5 years: 5000 points + 15% discount + VIP tier consideration. Long-term customer perks: Waived activation fees for additional services, reduced security deposits, faster service approvals, dedicated account manager for 5+ year customers. Legacy customer recognition: Special events invitations, exclusive product previews, personalized service, highest priority support. Account age verification: Check account age in MyLankaTel app > Profile > Account Information. Benefits activation: Automatic upon reaching milestones, no action required, benefits stack with VIP tier benefits. Corporate accounts: Company-wide loyalty benefits based on total account age across all connections.

Refer friends and family to earn rewards: How referral program works: 1) Get unique referral code from MyLankaTel app > Referrals section. 2) Share code with friends via SMS, WhatsApp, email, or social media. 3) Friend registers new LankaTel connection using your code. 4) Both parties earn rewards when referral stays active 30 days. Referrer rewards: 500 loyalty points per successful referral, LKR 100 account credit after 30 days, additional 200 points if referral activates postpaid plan, bonus 1000 points for every 5 successful referrals. Referee rewards: New customer gets LKR 50 welcome credit, waived SIM activation fee (LKR 300 value), 1GB free data on first recharge, special new customer package discounts. Referral tracking: View referral status in app, see pending and completed referrals, track reward earnings. Referral limits: Maximum 20 referrals per calendar year, referrals must be new LankaTel customers (never had LankaTel service before), referrals must stay active minimum 30 days. Corporate referrals: Companies can refer other businesses, bulk referral rewards available, contact 1237 for corporate referral program details. Reward processing: Points credited within 48 hours of referral activation, account credits appear on next bill cycle.

Regular account maintenance and update requirements: Required updates: Keep contact information current (email, phone, address), update NIC if renewed or changed, maintain valid payment method for auto-pay, review and update security settings quarterly. Profile maintenance: Update profile picture annually, refresh security questions, verify backup contact information, review linked accounts. Document updates: Submit updated address proof if moved, update business registration if company details changed, renew student verification annually, update senior citizen status if applicable. System maintenance: LankaTel performs scheduled maintenance (notified via SMS), account access may be limited during maintenance, maintenance usually overnight (12 AM-4 AM), no charges during maintenance periods. Account health check: Review account status monthly, check for outstanding issues, verify all services active, ensure payment methods valid. Proactive maintenance: Enable automatic updates in app, subscribe to account health notifications, set reminders for document renewals, keep app updated to latest version. Benefits of maintenance: Avoid service interruptions, prevent account issues, maintain security, ensure eligibility for promotions. Maintenance reminders: SMS and email reminders sent before document expiry, app notifications for required updates.

Access your account from multiple devices securely: Supported devices: Smartphones (iOS, Android), tablets, computers (web browser), smartwatches (limited features). Device registration: First login from new device requires OTP verification, device remembered for 30 days, can manually log out from any device. Simultaneous access: Maximum 3 devices can be logged in simultaneously, additional login attempts will log out oldest session, security alerts sent for new device logins. Security features: Device-specific login history, remote logout capability from any device, suspicious device alerts, device-based 2FA prompts. App access: MyLankaTel app available on iOS and Android, syncs across devices automatically, biometric login supported on compatible devices. Web access: Full account access via my.lankatel.lk, responsive design works on all screen sizes, secure SSL encryption. Device management: View all logged-in devices in app settings, remove devices remotely, set device nicknames for easy identification. Security best practices: Log out from shared devices, enable device lock on personal devices, review device list regularly, remove unknown devices immediately. Corporate accounts: IT administrators can manage employee device access, enforce device policies, remote device management available.

Complete account closure process and final settlement: Closure request: Call 1234 or visit service center with NIC, provide closure reason (optional), request cannot be cancelled once processed. Pre-closure requirements: Clear all outstanding balances (mandatory), return rented equipment (ONT, router, devices), cancel all active packages and subscriptions, settle device installments if applicable. Final bill: Generated within 7 days of closure request, includes all charges up to closure date, pro-rated charges for partial month, any outstanding fees. Payment: Pay final bill within 14 days, payment methods: app, bank transfer, service center, credit card. Refunds: Security deposit refund processed within 14 days of final payment, refund to registered bank account or service center collection, any account credit balance refunded. Number release: Mobile number released immediately upon closure, number cannot be recovered, inform contacts of number change. Equipment return: Return rented equipment within 7 days, equipment inspection at service center, damage charges may apply. Account data: Data retained for 24 months for records, can request data export before closure, download statements and history. Corporate accounts: Bulk closure requires 30-day notice, all employee accounts must be closed, consolidated final invoice provided.

Resolve common account errors and issues: Common errors: Login failures, payment processing errors, package activation failures, balance discrepancies, service access denied.
